arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen star Victor Boniface pulls off double nutmeg before performing 'Thierry Henry pass' to help set up goal in 4-0 win over Feyenoord
arts.sum: With an exquisite piece of footwork in the build-up to the second goal in a 4-0 win at Feyenoord, the Nigeria striker earned the praise of his teammates - and plenty of fans on social media.

arts.ttl: Barcelona stunned by Monaco after Lamine Yamal’s first Champions League goal
arts.sum: It was Barcelona’s first defeat under new boss Hansi Flick while there were wins for Bayer Leverkusen and Atletico Madrid

arts.ttl: Feyenoord no match for Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Feyenoord suffered a 4-0 loss to Bayer Leverkusen at De Kuip in their opening Champions League tie. After PSV’s loss in Turin, Feyenoord were the next side to enter the new format of the Champions League. Brian Priske started Antoni Milano began in the wing and Hwang In-Beom in midfield. The game was five minutes old […] The post Feyenoord no match for Bayer Leverkusen appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz strikes twice as Bayer Leverkusen thrash Feyenoord 4-0 in Champions League opener
arts.sum: Feyenoord have been flattened in Match day One of the Champions League, suffering a 4-0 home defeat to German champions Bayer Leverkusen. With hope running high across Rotterdam, there were…

arts.ttl: Wirtz records brace in first Champions' League match as Leverkusen defeat Feyenoord
arts.sum: German attacking phenom Florian Wirtz has recorded a brace in his Champions' League debut, helping his German club team get their 2024/25 UEFA Champions' League campaign off on the right foot with a 4-0 victory over Feyenoord Rotterdam.

arts.ttl: Champions League Player Ratings | Feyenoord 0-4 Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: In their return to the Champions League after a year away, Bayer Leverkusen compressively beat Feyenoord 4-0 in their opening game. Clincal. That is the best way to describe Leverkusen…

arts.ttl: Most valuable Champions League debutants - Florian Wirtz overtakes Bukayo Saka to set new record
arts.sum: It took Florian Wirtz just 35 minutes to make his mark in the UEFA Champions League. On Thursday evening, the Bayer Leverkusen star not only made his debut in the competition but also...

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs. Feyenoord Rotterdam
arts.sum: The lineups for this evening's Champions' League clash between defending German Bundesliga champions Bayer 04 Leverkusen and Feyenoord Rotterdam have been confirmed.

arts.ttl: Carro's outspoken ambition takes Leverkusen to new heights
arts.sum: When you've won three different trophies -- the Bundesliga's Meisterschale, the DFB-Pokal and the DFL-Supercup -- in the space of just a few frenetic months, why not display them from the spectacular Manhattan skyline as part of a specially arranged trophy tour in a bid to attract new fans? No one outside Leverkusen at that time knew the preparation would lead to hiring of his compatriot Xabi Alonso, but Carro and highly respected sporting CEO Simon Rolfes had crossed paths with the urbane former midfielder in the months prior.
Jamie Griffith has taken a look at the whole fixture list for week four of the Bundesliga season and selected a score prediction for each game.
